description:
Simple SPD shoes that let you spend more time riding, and less time fiddling with laces or dials. Soft, snug, and comfortable, the MX100 shoes are ready for gravel grinds and single track adventures. When it comes time to hike-a-bike, the heavily lugged outsole has great traction.

  • Supple upper hugs the foot for natural feel and when combined with the stiff sole, offers excellent pedalling efficiency
  • Y-strap and hook-and-loop closure make it quick and easy to adjust fit and get on and off
  • Perforated upper lets your feet breathe
  • Over-molded toe protection
  • Glass fibre reinforced nylon sole provides stiff pedalling platform
  • Reflective details at the heel help keep you seen
  • Grippy rubber tread feels good on and off the bike
name: Shimano SH-MX100 Cycling Shoes - Unisex
